verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My hope is built on nothing less Than Jesus Christ my righteousness. I dare not trust the sweetest frame But wholly lean on Jesus’ name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When darkness veils His lovely face, I rest on His unchanging grace. When all around my soul gives way, He then is all my hope and stay.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When Christ shall come with trumpet sound, to claim His bride, We’ll then be found, Dressed in His righteousness alone, Faultless to stand before the throne.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
